remotes.title: Remotes
remotes.name: Remote name
remotes.deleteConfirmBody: This will delete the remote and all buttons/signals.

remote.learningChoiceBody: This remote already has buttons. How do you want to continue?
remote.learningChoiceAddHint: Keep existing buttons and learn new ones.
remote.learningChoiceResetHint: Remove existing buttons and start from scratch.

button.deleteConfirmBody: This will delete the button and its signals.

settings.title: Settings
settings.learningDescription: Adjust how the app learns signals. These values are used as defaults in the learning wizard.
settings.learningPressTakesHint: How many times you press the button for one capture. More presses improve accuracy but take longer.
settings.learningTimeoutHint: How long to wait for a signal before giving up. Used for press and hold.
settings.learningHoldIdleHint: When learning a hold, the capture ends after this much quiet time between repeats. Increase if it ends too soon.
settings.learningRoundHint: Rounds tiny timing differences to reduce noise. Higher values smooth more but can reduce precision.
settings.learningMatchHint: How similar the presses must be to accept the signal. Higher is stricter.
settings.helpPublicBaseUrlBody: Use this if the UI is hosted under a sub-path (for example: /mqtt-ir-module/).
settings.helpApiKeyBody: If set, you need an API key to make changes in the UI.
settings.helpReverseProxyBody: Recommended: let your proxy add the API key for the UI. See reverse-proxy.md.

wizard.title: Learning wizard
wizard.qualityAdvice: Quality is low. Consider recapturing this button.
wizard.takesHint: How many times you press the button for one capture. More presses improve accuracy but take longer.
wizard.timeoutHint: How long to wait for a signal before giving up. Used for press and hold.
wizard.errorLearningActiveOther: Learning is active for another remote ({{remote}}). Stop it first.

errors.unauthorizedTitle: Write access requires an API key
errors.unauthorizedBody: Configure reverse proxy header injection or set PUBLIC_API_KEY (not recommended).
errors.timeoutBody: Press the button within the timeout and try again.
errors.conflictBody: The server reported a conflict. Try again or stop the current learning session.
errors.offlineBody: Check container / network and try again.
